description: React component 'Dropzone' for uploading PDF, PPT, and PPTX files via drag-and-drop or file browse with accessible UI.

methods.name: Dropzone
methods.description: A React functional component that creates a drag-and-drop area and file browse button for uploading files with specified accepted file types.

methods.name: handle
methods.description: Handles the files from drop or browse input, filtering for specific file extensions, and passes them to the onFiles callback.
